text: Chief Osuolale Abimbola Richard Akinjide, SAN (4 November 1930 â€“ 21 April 2020) was a Nigerian lawyer and politician. He was born in Ibadan, Western Region. He worked under Prime Minister Tafawa Balewa and President Shehu Shagari. From 1979 to 1983, Akinjide was Minister of Justice. Akinjide died on 21 April 2020 in Ibadan, aged 89.Richard Akinjide, Former Justice Minister, Is Dead ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian lawyers Category:Judges Category:Politicians from Ibadan
title: Richard Akinjide
